name: HotDog TD
description:
This is a tower defense game!

How to play:
- Before the wave starts, put towers on the foundations.
- You need some coins to put a new tower.
- Press "start" button to start the wave.
- During a wave, you towers attacks the enemies, hot dogs, automatically.
- When you beat all the enemies in a wave, the wave ends.
- If an enemies reaches to the castle, you lose one life point.
- You'll win the stage if you finish the final wave befe you lose all of your life points.
